Detailed Description

LanguageProvider is a read-only provider to retrieve several languages which are defined in ISO 639-1 (2 letter language codes). This provider has the id c_language_provider_id. LanguageProvider offers the following columns:
c_dcs_language_code_id NumberType The language-code as specified in Apc/DataCodingSchemeLanguage.
c_language_name_id WStringType The key for the language name for translation via Tr().
c_2_letter_iso639_code_id WStringType Two letter language code according to ISO 639-1.
c_3_letter_iso639_code_id WStringType Three letter language code according to ISO 639-2.
